==============================
一、uboot下测试过程：
==============================
测试位流下载，进入uboot后执行：
=>mmc rescan && fatload mmc 0:1 0x2000000 /top.bit;
=>fpga loadb 0 0x2000000 13321503

等待FPGA_DONE灯亮起，则下载位流完成，此时LED-D10闪烁

并且可以访问AXI_GPIO对应内存：
=>md 0x41200000

可以访问、读写AXI_BRAM对应内存
=>md 0x40000000

==============================
二、vxWorks下测试过程：
==============================
/*
接口代码在： fmsh_fmql_xj\bsp_drv\devc\devc_2_vx\vxDevC.c: void testvx_update_bit3(char* bit_file)
*/

->testvx_update_bit3 "/sd0:1/pl_test.bit"

-> md 0x41200000
0x41200000:  00000000 0000007F 00000000 00000000 
0x41200010:  00000000 0000007F 00000000 00000000 
0x41200020:  00000000 0000007F 00000000 00000000 
0x41200030:  00000000 0000007F 00000000 00000000 
0x41200040:  00000000 0000007F 00000000 00000000 
0x41200050:  00000000 0000007F 00000000 00000000 
0x41200060:  00000000 0000007F 00000000 00000000 
0x41200070:  00000000 0000007F 00000000 00000000 
0x41200080:  00000000 0000007F 00000000 00000000 
0x41200090:  00000000 0000007F 00000000 00000000 
0x412000A0:  00000000 0000007F 00000000 00000000 
0x412000B0:  00000000 0000007F 00000000 00000000 
0x412000C0:  00000000 0000007F 00000000 00000000 
0x412000D0:  00000000 0000007F 00000000 00000000 
0x412000E0:  00000000 0000007F 00000000 00000000 
0x412000F0:  00000000 0000007F 00000000 00000000 


-> md 0x40000000
0x40000000:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40000010:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40000020:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40000030:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40000040:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40000050:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40000060:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40000070:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40000080:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40000090:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x400000A0:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x400000B0:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x400000C0:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x400000D0:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x400000E0:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x400000F0:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 

-> *0x40000000=0x12345678
0x40000000: value = 305419896 = 0x12345678 = 'x'

-> md 0x40000000
0x40000000:  12345678 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40000010:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40000020:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40000030:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40000040:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40000050:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40000060:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40000070:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40000080:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40000090:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x400000A0:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x400000B0:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x400000C0:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x400000D0:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x400000E0:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x400000F0:  00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
